sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> that is <radical>good</radical>. This fabled creature has never been seen, but you <kanji>wander</kanji> the lands in search of it.
meaningInfo: You wander everywhere, with no particular direction in mind.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>wander</kanji>, you come across a clue. It is fish <reading>roe</reading> (<ja>ろう</ja>).
readingInfo: Wherever the good tsunami goes, it leaves delicious fish roe behind. That's what makes it a good tsunami.
